title: EB0-EB404-LINCOLN THEATER
description: Ongoing capital improvements needed at District-owned, historic theater built in early 1900s on the U Street corridor (1215 U Street NW). Funds in FY 2011 will be used to upgrade and improve a chronically faltering HVAC system.
progress_assessment: HVAC Design has been completed and permitted.
related_projects: - Milestone Data Projected Actual Environmental Approvals Design Start (FY) Design Complete (FY) Construction Start (FY) Construction Complete (FY) Closeout (FY)
